resources.string: The code must be 6 digits long

Welcome to the essteling quiz app. This app is played in the queue of an attraction of your choice. Above on the map you can see which attractions all contain one of our quiz boards. You play the quiz by going to one of these boards and entering the code that is displayed. After this, a question will be shown on your phone, you can answer this question by pressing 1 of the buttons at the board corresponding to your answer.
The answer you\'ve just entered is incorrect! The right answer is:
The answer you\'ve entered is correct! Congrats!
The answer will be submitted to the medal overview. Have fun and keep on collecting medals!
When you\'ve arrived too one of the displays in the que, press on of the buttons to generate a code
You can enter the code that has been generated in the app
If the answer is right, you will earn a point. For each attraction you\'ll need 3 points to earn a medal.
If you\'ve earned all medals, you will get a code that you can exchange for a little gift at the store
There is already a connection in the making

Within a few seconds a question will be displayed in the app with 4 multiple choice options below it. When you have discussed all the possible options and knop the answer, you can enter the answer using the buttons below the LCD screen
The answer must be given via the buttons on the LCD screen
